control_attributes.control_description: The information system prevents the automatic execution of mobile code in [Assignment: organization-defined software applications] and enforces [Assignment: organization-defined actions] prior to executing the code.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system invalidates session identifiers upon user logout or other session termination.

Control Statement: The information system prevents the automatic execution of mobile code in [Assignment: organization-defined software applications] and enforces [Assignment: organization-defined actions] prior to executing the code.
